author: trent_vanepps
content:
i've updated the Resource repo: if you have new link to add or an update for existing information, please make a PR to this document. I hope it will be a collectively maintained source of truth for people working on the project and observers looking to engage more deeply with it

https://github.com/tvanepps/KZG-Ceremony-Resources
